channel.title: Hel with ice barrage
channel.description: How can I make it so people cannot barrage others underground? Usually the thing is if ABSY >= 3000 something then you can attavck (Wildy) But if you're underground absY is like 9000 something so they can barrage you but not meelee. Help?
